sense.gloss: (common) cold, influenza, flu, ague, inflammatory respiratory system illness (in general)
hindrance, obstacle, nuisance, disturbance, interruption, interference
demon who hinders Buddhist training, demon who obstructs sentient beings from maintaining moral behaviour
improper way (of doing), wrong way, unorthodox method
Yamataikoku, historical Japanese state thought to have existed during the late Yayoi period

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓をしている。
あなたは↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓をしています。
あなたの↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓を↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓しないようにします。
sdata.e: I'll do my best not to disturb your studying.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓するくらいなら↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑数↑↓すう↓↑独↑↓どく↓をやってるよ。
sdata.e: I will play Sudoku then instead of continuing to bother you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓に↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓をうつした。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑無邪気↑↓むじゃき↓さに↑付↑↓つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓んではいけない。
sdata.e: You must not take advantage of her innocence.

sdata.j: ↑気↑↓き↓をつけていたのに、↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓をひいてしまいました。
sdata.e: I was very careful, but I caught a cold.

sdata.j: ↑幾↑↓いく↓↑人↑↓にん↓かの↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑話↑↓はな↓し↑手↑↓て↓の↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓をし↑続↑↓つづ↓け、とうとう↑会↑↓かい↓は↑解散↑↓かいさん↓になった。
sdata.e: Some people kept interrupting the speakers, and finally broke up the meeting.

sdata.j: ↑寒↑↓さむ↓い↑季↑↓き↓↑節↑↓ぶし↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ると、↑体↑↓からだ↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓い↑人↑↓ひと↓はとかく↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓きやすい。
sdata.e: Those who are delicate in health are apt to catch a cold when the cold season sets in.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓の↑生徒↑↓せいと↓はおとなにくらべて２↑倍↑↓ばい↓も↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓をひく。
sdata.e: School children have colds twice as often as adults.

words.gloss: (common) cold, influenza, flu, ague, inflammatory respiratory system illness (in general)
hindrance, obstacle, nuisance, disturbance, interruption, interference
